api_key.description: The API Key that allows interaction with the API

rate_limit.description: Allows users to set the speed of API calls to work with the Vultr Rate Limit

retry_limit.description: Allows users to set the maximum number of retries allowed for a failed API call.

hostname.description: The hostname of the instance. Updating the hostname will cause a force new. This behavior is in place to prevent accidental reinstalls. Issuing an update to the hostname on UI or API issues a reinstall of the OS.
